name: red and blue (itch) (saadi saadi)
description:
you are a circle thing that changes colors all the time (from red to blue and from blue to red ) and it follows the mous cursor all the time , so go for stars to win levels , but be careful dont touch red things when you are blue and dont touch blue things when you are red 

mouse = navigate the circle 

space = dash (toward mouse cursor)

good luck beating the game ("-")
